Title: Quarantine
Writer: John Erick Dowdle (screenplay by), Drew Dowdle (screenplay by), Jaume Balagueró (based on the motion picture "Rec" written by), Luiso Berdejo (based on the motion picture "Rec" written by), Paco Plaza (based on the motion picture "Rec" written by)
Actors: Jennifer Carpenter, Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech
Plot: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.
